title: ►Awesome Two-Story House in Thornton ► for Rent
posting_body: Spacious kitchen with all appliances included.
Large master bedroom with 5-piece master bathroom and Recess.
Close to school, park, walking trails, shopping, and easy access to I-25 and E-470.
Tenant responsible for water/sewer, gas, electric, trash removal and yard maintenance.
Landlord pays HOA fees, Tenant follows HOA rules.
Estimated Available: The 1st or 2nd week of September.
Application, credits, background, and rental history checks are mandatory for all applicants.
Please respond to the posting with the following info (Sorry, will not respond without answers):
When will you need to move in?
Who are the occupants and relationships?
What is your rental payment history(missed or late payment), ever evicted?
Due to COVID-19, only able to schedule showings for serious potential applicants to protect both current and potential tenants.
Please do not ask to schedule a showing upon first contact.
Serious inquiry with good credit scores and rental history only.
